sub.description: The subject (end-user) identifier. This member is always present in a claims set.

name.description: The full name of the end-user, with optional language tag.

given_name.description: The given or first name of the end-user, with optional language tag.

family_name.description: The surname(s) or last name(s) of the end-user, with optional language tag.

middle_name.description: The middle name of the end-user, with optional language tag.

nickname.description: The casual name of the end-user, with optional language tag.

preferred_username.description: The username by which the end-user wants to be referred to at the client application.

profile.description: The URL of the profile page for the end-user, with optional language tag.

picture.description: The URL of the profile picture for the end-user.

website.description: The URL of the end-user’s web page or blog.

email_verified.description: True if the end-user’s email address has been verified, else false.

birthdate.description: The end-user’s birthday, represented in ISO 8601:2004 YYYY-MM-DD format. The year may be 0000, indicating that it is omitted. To represent only the year, YYYY format is allowed.

zoneinfo.description: The end-user’s time zone, e.g. Europe/Paris or America/Los_Angeles.

locale.description: The end-user’s locale, represented as a BCP47 language tag. This is typically an ISO 639-1 Alpha-2 language code in lowercase and an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code in uppercase, separated by a dash. For example, en-US or fr-CA.

phone_number.description: The end-user’s preferred telephone number, typically in E.164 format, for example +1 (425) 555-1212 or +56 (2) 687 2400.

phone_number_verified.description: True if the end-user’s telephone number has been verified, else false.

updated_at.description: Time the end-user’s information was last updated, as number of seconds since the Unix epoch (1970-01-01T0:0:0Z) as measured in UTC until the date/time.

address.description: A JSON object describing the end-user’s preferred postal address with any of the following members:

formatted.description:
The full mailing address, with multiple lines if necessary. Newlines can be represented either as a 
 or as a 
.

street_address.description:
The street address component, which may include house number, stree name, post office box, and other multi-line information. Newlines can be represented either as a 
 or as a 
.

region.description: State, province, prefecture or region component.

postal_code.description: Zip code or postal code component.
